transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir this is Shailesh from DSM Speciality Chemical sir.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Shailesh ji Pravesh Sharma baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART head office Noida se.
Customer: Boliye sir.
Executive: Ji sir aapka jo call aaya tha regarding wo services ko disable karne ke liye DSM ki.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To wo sir hum aage proceed kar rahe the aap bhi mail hame kar dijiyega to hum aapka ye wala account disable kar denge.
Customer: Sir meri madam se baat hui aur madam ko mere ko baat ye karne ki thi ki jab bhi aapne jab bhi aapne paid service DSM ko di to aapko us time uska GST details lena chahiye tha ya nahi lena chahiye tha sir wo bol rahe the sir ki hamara purane customer hai isliye humne nahi liya to galti meri hai ya aapki hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir galti aapki bhi nahi hai aur galti hamari bhi nahi hai aur galti hai hi nahi yaha pe jab aapka ye account start hua tha na sir 2021 mein.
Customer: To exactly sir exactly mera account account tha lekin wo regular matlab normal account tha.
Executive: Sir ek bar ek bar ek bar mujhe allow kijiyega sir ek bar mujhe allow kijiyega.
Executive: Aapka 2021 mein ye account start hua tha IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Sir mere account mere account se aap samjhiye bhale aap jo bhi bole lekin mere account se wo banda mal bech raha hai mal le raha hai usme.
Executive: Sir ek bar sir ek bar mujhe to bolne dijiye sir fir aap boliye.
Customer: Sir mere pass se na billing kar raha hai aur mujhe pata nahi ye to mere samne mere hi friend ne mere ko bheja bhai tu ye dekh raha hai kya tab main samjha ke.
Executive: Are sir main aapko main aapko batata hu main aapki baat samajh gaya sir aap bilkul sahi keh rahe hain aapne hame bataya aur hum isko band bhi kar rahe hain dekhiye sir aaj 2021 mein humne jab abhi aapka account check kara 2021 mein jab GST hame diya gaya tha ye wala DSM speciality chemical ka us time pe Manish Bansal aapke partner the kahenge to main aapko GST bhej deta hu humne nikala hai.
Customer: Mere ko pata hai aapko pata hai wo sab pata hai sir mere ko.
Executive: Ha ab ab sir ek cheez mujhe bataye sir dekhiye agar aapka partnership toota to us time pe shayad aapko hi pata hoga aapke knowledge mein ki IndiaMART pe agar aap hame aaj se ek saal pehle bolte hum ek saal pehle band kar dete sir hame to sir dekhiye GST.
Customer: Ji number uska usme registered tha registered mein tha hum log ne hum log kabhi normal khali matlab usme dal ke rakha tha hum paid service nahi liye the to mere ko itna idea nahi tha ki ye wo bhi waisa karega and aap bhi bina kuch proof liye aap usko paid service de doge right abhi meri baat suniye ye usne liya hai March 2025 mein liya hai paid service abhi liya hai aur 2021 pe 2021 se chal raha hai 2021 se hai lekin hum log wahi bola paise deke nahi kiya tha ye paid service usne March 2025 mein liya aur mere se.
Executive: 2021 se paid service chal rahi hai sir 2021 se paid service chal rahi hai yahi main batana chah raha hu aapko 2021 se paid service chal rahi hai unki.
Executive: Abhi se nahi chal rahi hai sir 2021 se paid service chal rahi hai aur first time jab wo IndiaMART pe onboard hue the us time pe unhone jo hame GST diya tha wo us GST ke basis pe since Manish Bansal ka naam bhi tha to hamare liye.
Customer: Manish Bansali.
Executive: Ha Manish Bansari sorry to dono mein se koi ek banda bhi sir agar hame bolega dene ke liye to hum usko as an company ka hi part samjhenge na sir hum mana nahi kar sakte.
Executive: Hamare yaha to sir verify kara jata hai GST tabhi hum onboard karte hain agar aapne hame kabhi bhi jaise aapka ek do saal mein partnership toota hoga agar aap hame batate ki mera partnership toot gaya hai koi bhi social media ho sakta hai sir unka kisi dusre account pe bhi chal raha ho DSM ke naam se aap hame batayenge sir tabhi to hum action lenge.
Executive: Agar agar aapko ye pata laga aapne mujhe bataya main aaj ki aaj hi band kar raha hu sir isiliye main aapse mail mang raha hu mail daliye main sath ke sath band kar raha hu.
Customer: To matlab usne mere mere hi matlab company ke naam pe usne sab sab karta raha aur wo alag company se bech ke wo to kamata raha aur mere naam pe sab chalaya usne aisa ho gaya na.
Executive: Sir agar aapke naam pe chalaya but wo aapke past mein partner the na sir ab hame to nahi pata lagega sir ki partnership kaise tooti sir.
Executive: Hame to sir yahi hai ki DSM speciality chemical.
Customer: Aaj madam mere ko ye stop karwane ke liye mere pass se mera GST mang rahi hai mere pass sab mang rahi hai to us din aap agar service usko finalize ki to us din aapko mangna chahiye tha na sir.
Executive: Sir hamare yaha pe GST jab dalta hai sir pehli baat sir koi bahut 100 mein koi ek hi customer hota hai jo GST ka claim nahi lena chahta har koi apna GST dilwata hai teen se char hajar mein GST ban jata hai pata nahi unhone aisa kyun kara pehli baat ye dusri cheez ye sir hamare yaha pe unki service kabhi band hi nahi hui 2021 se continuity mein chal rahi hai hamare pass jab koi new service leta hai tab hum unka GST verify karte hain aur GST verify karte hain.
Customer: Sir ye bataye ki agar IndiaMART pe service 2021 se chal rahi hai to hamara payment hua hoga aapke pass DSM se hua hoga.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ha to mere ko GST bataye ye jo last wala jabhi payment last jo payment hua hai wo wo kab hua wo kahan se DSM se payment hua hai to main agree karunga agar DSM se payment nahi hua hai to main agree nahi karunga sir aapki baat se.
Executive: Sir payment hamare yaha pe hum payment ka source kabhi check nahi karte IndiaMART aap agar kal ko sir koi.
Customer: Samajh samajh samajh gaya aaj aaj madam mere ko bol rahi hai ki jo payment hai main aapke DSM mein wapas uska de aap.
Executive: Nahi nahi hum hum aapko refund nahi kar rahe wo payment hum refund kar hi nahi rahe is account mein hum is account ko hi close kar rahe hain.
Customer: Wo kar rahe hain ya nahi kar rahe wo secondary hai to mere yahan se payment DSM kyunki aap IndiaMART agar jabhi kuch bhi karega to GST number se kar raha hai to officially wo DSM se wo transfer hona chahiye paisa jab DSM se transfer nahi ho raha hai to sir waha pe bhi aapko samajh mein aana chahiye ki DSM se kyun nahi ho raha hai account se kaun karega.
Executive: Sir ab main wahi aapko bata raha hu hamare yaha pe payment ka source nahi dekha jata koi bhi client kisi bhi company ka apne family account se hi payment karega hum usko uski company ke naam ka GST de dete hain GST.
Customer: Sir matlab main main aaj IndiaMART pe koi company dekh lu agar mere ko lage ki ha ye ye hai to main kisi ka bhi payment karke main meri isme karwa lunga mere number pe.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul bilkul bilkul hum GST bhi de denge.
Customer: Ye to galat hai na sir aaj koi bhi company.
Executive: Sir aaj aaj ki mujhe bataye aap proof mangoge na sir payment lene se pehle sir payment lene se pehle bhi le lo.
Executive: Sir proof hamare mein yahi hota hai jab hamare yaha pe GST dalta hai hum OTP ke through verification karate hain GST verified karwate hain GST verified ek bar wahi kar sakta hai jo GST ka malik hoga us time pe ye GST verified wo hai sir uske alava uske alava koi aur kar nahi sakta kyunki usme registered number bhi OTP jata hai to aapka GST tab se active raha agar ye GST kahin band ho jata sir aap ek cheez bataye sir hame hame koi fayda thodi na is cheez se sir aap ek cheez mujhe bataye hame aisi cheez karke lekin sir mera nuksan ho gaya na sir aaj mere mere naam se wo sab market mein ghum raha hai na galat tarike se.
Executive: Sir aapke hi partner the na sir ab aap koi ab aapke baad mein aapka hua.
Customer: Main to September 2024 mein chod diya tha usko.
Executive: Sir September 2024 mein aapne choda na sir to aapko usi time hi har jagah check karna chahiye tha kahan kahan pe DSM ka naam dikh raha hai aap usi time mujhe bolte main 24 mein band kar deta sir mere ko to sir band hi karna hai.
Customer: Ji ji aap mera mera account pehle close kar dijiye mere ko yaha pe online dikhna band ho jayega main aapko jo bhi baki ka remaining process main kar dunga aap mujhe mail kar dijiye main account band karwa raha hu aap mail kar dijiye ki mera DSM speciality main aapko mera account totally close karke uska number kyunki dekhiye agar aaj bhi aap IndiaMART ki site pe ja ke dekhoge DSM to usme GST mein mera aur do log ka do log ka naam hai uska naam hi nahi hai aaj ki date mein.
Executive: Sir main ab aapko wahi to bata raha hu ki main to band karunga tab jab aap mujhe likh ke bhejenge na sir main to abhi band karwane ke liye tayar hu aap mujhe mail to kariye sir.
Customer: Sir meri baat suniye sir IndiaMART pe mera already update ho chuka hai waha pe aapke yaha Nirav Patel and Shailesh Verma do hi hai wo wo hai hi nahi uske baad usne aapne kar diya.
Executive: Sir main main bhi thoda main bhi mere sir meri baat suniye main bhi ek do log.
Customer: Ji to main unse baat kar lu baad mein aapko jo bhi.
Executive: Sir fir ye service ya fir whatsapp pe hame mail karenge main aapko email id dal deta hu jab aap mail karenge main service band karwa dunga Saturday Sunday ka off rehta hai.
Customer: Band karwane ka sawal nahi hai main sir service to band karwa dunga lekin main ek do logo se consult kar raha hu isme main kya kar sakta hu.
Executive: Bilkul kar dijiye bilkul kar dijiye main IndiaMART ke to IndiaMART ke against mein ya fir wo person se wo person jo kar raha hai uske against mein main kya kar sakta hu main puch lu baad mein.
Executive: Bilkul kariye sir bilkul bilkul kar sakte hain aap wo aapka legal right hai aap bilkul kariye aap aapne hame bola tha ek kam ke liye ki aap service ko band kariye main uske liye ready hu but aap mujhe mail nahi bhej rahe to aapki taraf se ye pending hai maine bas ye batane ke liye aapko call kara jis din mail karunga us din band kar dijiye suniye meri baat mail karunga us din band kar dijiyega sir mean while main thoda dekh leta hu ek do din ek do din mere ko time dijiye.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai sir theek hai main whatsapp pe aapko main whatsapp pe aapko apni email id aur Manisha ki email id de raha hu aap us pe mail kar dijiyega main band kara dunga jaise hi aapka mail aayega main do din ye thoda inquiry kar leta hu bilkul le lijiye bilkul le lijiye sir bilkul le lijiye aap hame mail kijiyega usi time hi do din hame band karwane mein lagte hain service ko to do din ke andar aapke mail aane ke do din ke andar hum isko band karwa denge aur koi refund aapke pass nahi aayega theek hai sir.
Executive: Yes yes yes.
Customer: Refund actually sir mere account mein hi aana chahiye usko dene ka nahi aayega sir nahi aayega hum is account ko permanently disable hi kar rahe hain kuch nahi aayega abhi wo abhi aaj wo uska GST matlab mera naam leke wo marketing kar raha tha and uske alag GST se raha tha.
Executive: Sir wo to madam bhi batayegi mere ko.
Customer: Sir ab aap partnership aapka toota aapko ek bar check to karna chahiye tha na sir ab hame kaise pata lagega aapka partnership unke sath nahi raha aap lekin aaj main abhi kuch bhi karne ja raha hu to aap mere pass sab officially mang rahe ho to tabhi jab paid kiya tabhi bhi aapko karna chahiye tha.
Executive: Sir aapka to number hi nahi hai sir aapka to number hi nahi hai na hamare pass aap ek bar ye GST number se aap mera phone number nikal lenge sir mobile number uske pass aapko GST mangna chahiye tha na abhi jab March 2024 se aapka 25 se start hua tabhi GST mangna chahiye tha na sir.
Executive: Sir unka unka unka jo renewal hua hai aapke dispute hone se pehle hua hai unka 26 tak 27 tak ka service chal raha hai usme hum nahi mangte hain usme hum kabhi bhi nahi mangte hain hum sirf us scenario pe mangte hain jab GST suspend ho ya naya GST dalna ho ek bar verify GST ho gaya fir hum nahi mangte hain aur aapka last verification ek dedh saal pehle hi hua tha GST ka is vajah se.
Executive: Theek hai sir ab aap main aapko whatsapp karwa raha hu aap mujhe mail kar dijiyega hum band karwa denge.
Customer: Theek hai okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's ex-partner using his company name.

- Wants refund in his account.

- Why GST details not taken during paid subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to disable the account.

- Explained GST verification process.

- Clarified refund will not be issued.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send an email to disable account.

- Executive will close account after receiving email.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account closure, gst, partnership, refund, verification
